Reviews.Title: Craig TV
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: It gets a good picture, is lightweight and easy to move around.  It was just what I needed for the kitchen counter.

Reviews.Title: Don't Waste Your Money....
Reviews.Author: Unlucky Recipient
Reviews.Content: ... I'm lucky (or unlucky) enough that I got this television as a gift, so at least I didn't have to waste my well earned $150 bucks on it. Simply put, this television is terrible!!!General Issues:TERRIBLE VIEWING ANGLE- the only way you can see the picture is if you're looking straight on directly at the television at eye level. I have it in my bedroom on a table, and I can't lie down or sit in a chair off to the side of it because the picture goes COMPLETELY blackPOOR SOUND- the highest level volume still isn't enough for me to hear the dialogue if I have my window open or my bedroom fan onProblem with my unit:I had installed a digital antenna to pick up local stations, but tried to attach it to my cable the other day. My cable wasn't working so I decided to plug the antenna back in for the meantime, and now it doesn't work! The TV won't pick up ANY channels, can't get any help from the company and am completely s.o.l. Now it's basically a glorified 'not so portable' DVD player. It's completely useless- I can't wait until I can buy a new TV.

Reviews.Title: Dead after four months
Reviews.Author: Stephen D. Howard "Cheap Guy"
Reviews.Content: We didn't experience the same image problems as other reviewers, and the sound was adequate.  However, the picture started freezing this week, and now it doesn't get any channels at all.  It may be under warranty, I'll check.  Shame on me for not buying the extended warranty on something that had such poor reviews in the first place.

Reviews.Title: Good little TV
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: This is a good little TV.  I got one for the kitchen, then another 2 for bedrooms.Only problem I've had with any of the 3 so far, is after I used one as a computer monitor, the color never came back in right, for the TV mode.  I'm getting a lot of red blotches on the tv mode, for the one I used as a monitor.As long as you never use them for computer monitors, they are really good little tv's.  Great for a small room.I also can't find any specs anywhere for wall mounting.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: A. Menendez
Reviews.Content: This TV failed a couple of weeks after we purchased it. The power light would come on but the screen was not visible.  We contacted the manufacturer, who took two weeks to return our email but could not resolve the problem.  Then we tried to send the unit back to the Amazon seller, Ocean Reef Electronics, who refused to take it back because it had been just over 30 days.  We should have checked out the seller first, who has a terrible reputation (complaints on RipoffReport.com, etc).  We're surprised and disappointed that Amazon would allow this type of seller to do business through their website.

Reviews.Title: 15" Inch HD TV and Monitor
Reviews.Author: Best Value
Reviews.Content: Out of Box this unit provided instant resultsNeeded HDMI inputs and it had want i needed.didn't care about the sound because we are using head phones forthis application.Works great, thanks

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Renny
Reviews.Content: This is a great little tv for the price!  Its really light and therefore very portable.  The speakers dont have a great sound, but what tv speakers really ever do?  The picture is awesome.  Overall, I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: AB
Reviews.Author: Allen Burnham
Reviews.Content: The product, Craig TV was defective and I had to return it. It cost me $30 to ship it back by UPS. I should have been reimbursed for this cost because the TV would not work right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Tried twice, neither one worked
Reviews.Author: Geoffrey C. Ault "gault"
Reviews.Content: First order received and the tv didn't work.  It came on but the screen was damaged so no picture.Second order power came on but no sound or picture.Amazon was great in returning both tv's.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: charles hatchette
Reviews.Content: The first tv shipped to me was broken - had to ship it back - the sound worked but the quality of the sound matched that of a 1950's tv. Decoded to go with another brand.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: clark
Reviews.Content: great picture ,perfect size and fits right where and how we wanted it to look. we watch while sitting on island chairs

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Baskerville
Reviews.Content: A great deal for the Price. This Tv have a nice resolution and his multifunctions make a pleasure control it! Buy it!

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: srochman
Reviews.Content: This product showed up on time, but right out of the box did not work.  There was no picture or sound, just a blank white screen.

Reviews.Title: Light Nice set
Reviews.Author: Diane M Steffens
Reviews.Content: This bargain priced set replaced our 7 year 15" LCD in the kitchen. Our only problem is that the cable remote can not find the set and the set code does not work for the remote as well. Oh well ,at least the controls on the top.

Reviews.Title: Did not work.
Reviews.Author: Brad
Reviews.Content: The tv was completley busted when delivered. Screen was cracked and sound sputtered and did not function properly. Ocean Reef electronics was very helpful with there return process and I received a full refund for my purchase. I will not be rebuying a replacement in the future.

Reviews.Title: Church TV
Reviews.Author: Lee Mcmurray "leejomc"
Reviews.Content: I had been looking for a small tv for our church sound bothe and when I saw this one it was the ideal one for what we needed.  The product was shipped without damage and it came in prompt time.  I installed it and it is doing a good job.

Reviews.Title: Reviews are true:  taking it back!
Reviews.Author: 2kayak
Reviews.Content: We tried our best to work with the color (got it adusted), and darkness (got it adjusted), and the tilt (got it adjusted), but only the person looking at the TV straight on could get a good picture.  It's on a shelf over the kitchen table and anyone sitting to the right or left of it gets a completely distorted picture. From across the room straight on it's fine, from across the table it is fine, but from either side - no way.  Taking it back.

Reviews.Title: Never worked right
Reviews.Author: guddy1984
Reviews.Content: It was difficult to get this tv to pick up stations at first, now it will pick up more stations, but not all.  However, it is unwatchable because it turns itself off and on constantly. and when I say off, I mean no juice whatsoever.I am hoping it is the adapter, I have not tried to replace that yet.  The tv has been a dissapointment, as I have tried it in several different areas to try and pick up stations and several different plug in areas, but I just have to finally admit, the tv really isnt very good.

Reviews.Title: No video display
Reviews.Author: SirReepicheep
Reviews.Content: Received the TV in a timely fashion (the day before it was scheduled to arrive).  Hooked the TV up and could only get audio.  Did not even act like the LCD was getting any power to it.  Tried calling the seller and could only leave a message, did not receive a call back from the message I left.  Sent an email to the seller, did not receive any reply.  Requested a return through Amazon, received a reply from the seller within a few hours with return information.  The seller stated in that reply that they do not offer exchanges, just returns and then you have to re order.  Considering that they did not reply to phone messages or email (except when requesting a return through Amazon) I am not interested in re ordering.  Not very pleased.
